General.Name: US Metro Bancorp Inc
General.Description: US Metro Bancorp, Inc. operates as the bank holding company for US Metro Bank that provides various banking services to commercial business and individual consumers. The company's deposit products include checking, savings, money market, and certificate of deposit accounts, as well as treasury management services. It also offers real estate, business term and lines of credit, and small business administration loans, as well as construction and warehouse lending services. In addition, the company provides online and mobile banking, ATM, and wire transfer services, as well as safe deposit box and debit card services. It operates branches in California; and loan production offices in Dallas, Seattle, Inland Empire of Southern California, Northern California, Fresno, and Sacramento. The company was founded in 2006 and is headquartered in Garden Grove, California.
General.Address: 9866 Garden Grove Boulevard, Garden Grove, CA, United States, 92844
